name: Young Blue Dragon
senses: blindsight 30 ft., tremorsense 30 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 18

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon attacks once with its bite and twice with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a 60-foot-long  5-foot-wide line of lightning. Each creature in that area makes a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw  taking 44 (8d10) lightning damage on a failed save or half damage on a success. A creature that fails the save can't take reactions until the end of its next turn.

special_abilities.name: Desert Farer
special_abilities.desc: The dragon ignores difficult terrain or obscurement caused by sand or gravel, even while flying. Additionally, it ignores the effects of extreme heat.

special_abilities.name: Dune Splitter
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can remain submerged in sand and gravel for up to 4 hours. It has advantage on Stealth checks to hide in this way.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The dragons spellcasting ability is Charisma (save DC 15). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components. 3/day each:blur, silent image
